name: The Wagyu Truffle Burger
summary: Premium A5 Wagyu beef patty with black truffle aioli.
description: Experience the ultimate indulgence with our signature burger. We start with a 1/2 lb patty of premium A5 Wagyu beef, seared to perfection. Topped with aged Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, and a generous layer of house-made black truffle aioli.

name: Rustic Marghertia Pizza
summary: Classic wood-fired pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella.
description: Our dough is fermented for 48 hours to create the perfect airy crust. Topped with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh buffalo mozzarella, and basil leaves picked from our own garden.

name: Spicy Thai Green Curry
summary: Authentic Thai curry with coconut milk and bamboo shoots.
description: A fiery and aromatic curry made with homemade green chili paste, creamy coconut milk, bamboo shoots, and Thai basil. Served with a side of jasmine rice.

name: Caesar's Palace Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan crisps and anchovy dressing.
description: Not your average Caesar. We use whole baby gem lettuce hearts, shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano, and garlic butter croutons, all tossed in our signature creamy dressing.

name: Lobster Bisque
summary: Rich and creamy soup made with fresh Maine lobster.
description: A velvety smooth bisque finished with a splash of cognac and heavy cream. Garnished with chunks of fresh lobster claw meat and chives.

name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy Arborio rice with porcini and truffle oil.
description: Slow-cooked Arborio rice folded with a mix of wild porcini, shiitake, and oyster mushrooms. Finished with butter, parmesan, and a drizzle of white truffle oil.

name: Inferno Wings
summary: Crispy chicken wings tossed in ghost pepper sauce.
description: Warning: These are hot. Crispy fried wings coated in a house-made sauce featuring ghost peppers and cayenne. Served with blue cheese dip to cool the burn.

name: Seared Atlantic Salmon
summary: Pan-seared salmon with lemon butter sauce.
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet, skin-on and crisped to perfection. Served over a bed of quinoa and roasted asparagus, topped with a dill lemon butter sauce.

name: Tacos Al Pastor
summary: Marinated pork with pineapple on corn tortillas.
description: Three soft corn tortillas filled with spit-roasted pork marinated in adobo. Topped with fresh pineapple, cilantro, and diced white onions.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: Nutrient-packed bowl with chickpeas and avocado.
description: A healthy mix of roasted sweet potatoes, spiced chickpeas, avocado slices, kale, and quinoa. Drizzled with a tahini lemon dressing.

name: Molten Lava Cake
summary: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey liquid center.
description: The perfect ending to any meal. A warm dark chocolate cake that oozes molten chocolate when cut. Served with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream.

name: New York Cheesecake
summary: Classic dense cheesecake with berry compote.
description: Traditional New York style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust. Dense, creamy, and rich, topped with a fresh strawberry and blueberry compote.

name: Avocado Toast Deluxe
summary: Sourdough toast topped with avocado and poached egg.
description: Thick-cut sourdough bread toasted and topped with smashed avocado, chili flakes, radish slices, and a perfectly poached free-range egg.

name: Buttermilk Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup.
description: Light and fluffy buttermilk pancakes stacked high. Served with whipped butter and 100% pure Canadian maple syrup.

name: Espresso Martini
summary: Vodka and coffee liqueur with fresh espresso.
description: A sophisticated pick-me-up. Vodka shaken vigorously with Kahlúa and a shot of fresh hot espresso, garnished with three coffee beans.

name: Berry Blast Smoothie
summary: Mixed berries blended with yogurt and honey.
description: A refreshing blend of strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries mixed with Greek yogurt and a touch of honey for natural sweetness.

name: Garlic Butter Prawns
summary: Juicy prawns sautéed in garlic and herbs.
description: Large tiger prawns pan-fried in a rich garlic and parsley butter sauce. Served with crusty baguette slices for dipping.

name: Beef Bolognese Pasta
summary: Tagliatelle with slow-cooked meat sauce.
description: Fresh egg tagliatelle pasta served with a rich, slow-simmered beef and tomato ragu. Topped with fresh basil and grated parmesan.

name: French Onion Soup
summary: Caramelized onion soup with cheesy crouton top.
description: Sweet onions caramelized for hours in beef broth and sherry. Baked in a crock with a baguette slice and melted Gruyère cheese on top.

name: Hibachi Steak
summary: Grilled steak cubes with vegetables and fried rice.
description: Tender steak cubes grilled hibachi-style with soy sauce and garlic butter. Served with zucchini, onions, and egg fried rice.
